original_text:
Therefore thus says the Lord, the God of hosts, the Lord:
“In all the squares there shall be wailing,
    and in all the streets they shall say, ‘Alas! Alas!’
They shall call the farmers to mourning
    and to wailing those who are skilled in lamentation,
korean_text: 그러므로 주 만군의 하나님 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 사람이 모든 광장에서 울겠고 모든 거리에서 슬프도다 슬프도다 하겠으며 농부를 불러다가 애곡하게 하며 울음꾼을 불러다가 울게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: In all the squares there shall be wailing,
and in all the streets they shall say,
They shall call the farmers to mourning
and to wailing those who are skilled in lamentation,
sentences.korean_translation: 또 애곡하기에 익숙한 자들을 불러 슬피 우게 하리라
